section_title: With the Platinum Credit Card you get:
content:
Control your cards at your fingertips: We’ve introduced new card features to 365 Online for your credit and debit cards. You can freeze and unfreeze your card, view the card PIN and much more.
Pay with your Smartphone/devices: You can make quick, easy and contactless payments using your phone/devices with Apple Pay and Google Pay.
Annual fee of €76.18. Pay no transaction fees when you use your credit card to pay for goods and services. You will have to pay a 2.25% cross border handling fee for non-Euro transactions. Also liable to annual Government Stamp Duty of €30.
Interest free credit on purchases: Pay your bill in full and on time every month and do not pay any interest on purchases. Enjoy up to 56 days interest free credit on what you buy. Interest is charged on unpaid balances and on cash advances from the date of the transaction.
24 Hour approval:3 We can usually approve your application within one working day. Once approved you can usually get your card within a week.
Lowest interest rate card: Our lowest interest rate credit card.
Travel Insurance:4 You can get comprehensive multi-trip travel insurance with winter sports. This applies when you pay at least half of the total cost of your travel fare with your credit card.
Instalment options: The credit card instalment plan means you can spread out the cost of bigger things you pay for.
Free Additional Cardholders: You can add up to 3 extra cardholders to your credit card account. You only pay one Government stamp duty (tax) of €30 every year.
Emergency Cash Service: If you lose your card when abroad, we will cancel it for you. If you are abroad, we can provide you with an Emergency Cash Advance Facility in most countries (Subject to available credit, fees and charges may apply).
Paying with Contactless: In the Republic of Ireland, you can make payments up to €50 by just tapping your card on the reader. This figure will vary in other countries.
Special Offers and Experiences with Mastercard Priceless: As a Bank of Ireland Mastercard Customer, you can enjoy exclusive benefits in Ireland and also when you travel abroad. Search “Mastercard Priceless” online for more information. It only takes a couple of minutes to apply online. There are terms and conditions and requirements for lending for all credit cards.
